title: Is it permissible to draw skeletons & skulls in Islam? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: motion says is it permissible to draw skulls and skeletons we know that drawing living creatures is prohibited in Islam and it's one of the major sins and the prophet Allah told us that those who draw portraits or images of living creatures are the most severely tormented on the day of judgment but there is an exception when you draw something that has no life in it then this is not a living creature if you draw a cellulite and there are no facial features there's no life in it if you draw a skeleton or if you draw a skull there is no life in it a piece of bone there is no life in it if you draw a butterfly that has no head no body but just only the wings this is permissible and uh has no problem inshallah [Music] thank you and have you ever taken a counseling session with me go to my website and you will find counseling sessions and apply for one if you can afford it that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled for one free session and this is for everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give them one free session without a problem a full half an hour so come to me and let's speak about it inshallah within the following two days or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's guidance to solve the problem once and for Allah
